name: tic-tac-toe-game
description: I will create a Tic-Tac-Toe Game using JavaScript. I will be using validation checks to implement the game features. The UI is designed using CSS so it is easy to create. In the game, Player-1 starts playing the game and both players make their moves in consecutive turns. The player who makes a straight 3-block chain wins the game.
author: alfonsoj.entwickler
